trans-unit.source: 11"x17" and duplex capable
trans-unit.target: 11 "x17 "和双工功能。

trans-unit.source: Hough finds skew angles in scanned document pages, using the Hough transform.
trans-unit.target: Hough使用Hough变换在扫描的文档页面中找到偏斜角。

trans-unit.source: Bilevel (black-and-white) bitmaps will produce lower quality results. For best results, scan to greyscale or RGB first, deskew with Hough, then reduce the colour depth to bilevel.
trans-unit.target: 双水平（黑白）位图将产生较低质量的结果。为了获得最佳结果，请先扫描到灰度或RGB ，然后使用Hough进行偏斜校正，然后将颜色深度减小到两级。

trans-unit.source: Brother ADS-2700W, USB + Ethernet + WiFi
trans-unit.target: 兄弟ADS-2700W,USB+以太网+WiFi。

trans-unit.source: Can scan directly to the network or to a memory stick
trans-unit.target: 可直接扫描到网络或记忆棒上。

trans-unit.source: Cheap on eBay
trans-unit.target: 廉价的eBay上

trans-unit.source: Generate angles (in CSV form) for a bunch of TIFF page images, one page per file:
trans-unit.target: 为一堆TIFF页面图像生成角度(CSV形式),每个文件一个页面。

trans-unit.source: Getting the best results
trans-unit.target: 获得最佳效果

trans-unit.source: Here's a histogram sample:
trans-unit.target: 这是一个直方图样本。

trans-unit.source: Hough deskewing is an inexact process, with many heuristics discovered by trial and error. Hough may not work well on your material without tuning and further modification. (We'd love your pull requests!)
trans-unit.target: 严格的偏移校正是一个不精确的过程，许多试探法是通过反复试验发现的。如果不进行调整和进一步修改，霍夫可能无法很好地处理您的材料。（我们很乐意您的要求！）

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Installation and usage
trans-unit.target: 安装和使用

trans-unit.source: It is oriented to batch processing, and can make use of multiple cores. (You'll want this - analysis and image processing is very CPU intensive!)
trans-unit.target: 它是面向批处理的,可以利用多个内核。(你会需要这个--分析和图像处理是非常耗费CPU的!)

trans-unit.source: Just about all of these files have been deskewed this way.
trans-unit.target: 几乎所有这些文件都已通过这种方式去偏斜。

trans-unit.source: License notice
trans-unit.target: 许可证公告

trans-unit.source: NOTE: This is a beta product!
trans-unit.target: 注意:这是一个测试版产品

trans-unit.source: Note that Hough cannot always determine a skew for a page (e.g. blank pages in particular), and will very occasionally get the skew wrong (depending on source material). It's worth reviewing these images if Hough makes a bad decision on your scans. Please submit these files along with the original image when filing an issue!
trans-unit.target: 请注意，霍夫（Hough）不能总是确定页面的歪斜度（例如，特别是空白页），并且偶尔会出错（取决于源材料）。如果Hough在扫描中做出错误的决定，则值得检查这些图像。提出问题时，请同时提交这些文件和原始图片！

trans-unit.source: Older versions of pip are fine, but you'll have to install MuPDF, its headers, and a compiler first, so PyMuPDF can be compiled locally.
trans-unit.target: 较早版本的 pip 很好，但是您必须首先安装MuPDF，其标头和编译器，以便可以在本地编译PyMuPDF。

trans-unit.source: Recommended scanners
trans-unit.target: 推荐使用的扫描仪

trans-unit.source: Requires a Windows XP VirtualBox for drivers
trans-unit.target: 需要Windows XP VirtualBox的驱动程序

trans-unit.source: Skew detection and correction in scanned images
trans-unit.target: 扫描图像的斜度检测和校正

trans-unit.source: The authors have tested this software with output from the following scanners:
trans-unit.target: 作者用下列扫描仪的输出对该软件进行了测试:

trans-unit.source: The deskewing results are placed in the results.csv file. Example:
trans-unit.target: 偏斜校正结果放置在 results.csv 文件中。例：

trans-unit.source: The first line is required to update pip to a new enough version to be compatible with manylinux wheel packaging, required for PyMuPDF.
trans-unit.target: 第一行需要将 pip 更新到足够新的版本，以与 manylinux 所需的许多Linux车轮包装兼容。

trans-unit.source: The program should work on various image input formats, and with both grey scale and RGB images. Hough works best with images ≥300dpi.
trans-unit.target: 该程序应适用于各种图像输入格式，以及灰度和RGB图像。霍夫效果最好用于≥300dpi的图像。

trans-unit.source: The same, but for a PDF file, and display a histogram at the end:
trans-unit.target: 同样的,但对于一个PDF文件,并在最后显示一个直方图。

trans-unit.source: The same, but show progress while running:
trans-unit.target: 同样的,但在运行时要显示进度。

trans-unit.source: There's a few guidelines you should follow to get the best deskewing results from your document scans:
trans-unit.target: 要想从文档扫描中获得最佳的纠偏效果,你应该遵循一些准则。

trans-unit.source: To get started right away, here's some examples.
trans-unit.target: 要马上开始,这里有一些例子。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Very low skew out of the box
trans-unit.target: 开箱即用,偏度极低

trans-unit.source: You can list them by running hough --help:
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过运行 hough --help 列出它们：

trans-unit.source: You can spy on Hough's attempts to perform deskewing by passing the --debug flag on the command line. The generated images, and any detected lines in them, are placed in the debug/<datetime>/ directory.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过 在命令行上传递 --debug 标志来监视Hough进行去偏斜的尝试。生成的图像及其中任何检测到的行都放置在 debug/<datetime>/ 目录中。

trans-unit.source: You'll need to install Poetry, then run:
trans-unit.target: 您需要安装Poetry，然后运行：

trans-unit.source: hough - Skew detection in scanned images
trans-unit.target: hough-扫描图像中的斜度检测。
